parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that the value is unique among different requests.

The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [How to ensure the idempotence of a request](~~25965~~).

parameters.name: ForceDetach
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances in the scaling group from the backend server group of the SLB instance that you want to detach from the scaling group. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the scaling group.

parameters.name: ScalingGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the scaling group.
